title: Low budgetary allocation to healthcare: Finance Secretary T V Somanathan says it is primarily states' resp - Economic Times
content: Low budgetary allocation to healthcare: Finance Secretary T V Somanathan says it is primarily states' resp  Economic Times
description: At a post-Budget interaction of the industry with Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman, lobby grouping CII President T V Narendran said the spending on healthcare, though higher than in the past, is 1.3 per cent of GDP, while the expectations are that the government should spend over 3 per cent.
